subject: Re: automated xstl test tool that can compare outputs
msgSnippet: Hi, I would apply both XSLs to a given set of XML documents and compare the output result. There are frameworks that allow for XML document comparaisons. a++
messageBody:
Hi,

I would apply both XSLs to a given set of XML documents and compare
the output result. There are frameworks that allow for XML document
comparaisons.

a++ CÃ©dric
